result.markdown:
---
title: "Comparação de Frequência"
format: html
---


## Comparação de frequência


::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_dd3a8af3390a861cda030e37faf5f35c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

survey <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx","survey")

library(janitor)

survey |> 
  tabyl (year, species) |> 
  adorn_percentages()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 year      Fgra      Fspp
 2009 0.8490566 0.1509434
 2010 0.8657407 0.1342593
 2011 0.7567568 0.2432432
```
:::
:::


## Gráfico de barras - frequência


::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_70c5e16d020e0be56b4a4b22d53e2610'}

```{.r .cell-code}
survey |> 
  filter(residue != "NA") |> 
  count (residue, species) |> 
  ggplot(aes(residue, n, fill = species))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Frequência de classe

### chisq.test
Realiza testes de tabela de contingência qui-quadrado e testes de qualidade de ajuste.


::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_ee02156fcf43a08dc9091f2b77425a83'}

```{.r .cell-code}
q <- table (survey$residue, survey$species)
chisq.test(q)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's Chi-squared test with Yates' continuity correction

data:  q
X-squared = 1.1997, df = 1, p-value = 0.2734
```
:::
:::


## Para frequências mais baixas

### fisher.test
Executa o teste exato de Fisher para testar o nulo de independência de linhas e colunas em uma tabela de contingência com marginais fixos.


::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_28c2439dc5b697e7b432674fd7b89200'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fisher.test(q)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Fisher's Exact Test for Count Data

data:  q
p-value = 0.2118
alternative hypothesis: true odds ratio is not equal to 1
95 percent confidence interval:
 0.357205 1.311411
sample estimates:
odds ratio 
 0.6819103 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
q <- table (survey$residue, survey$inc_class)
chisq.test(q)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	Pearson's Chi-squared test with Yates' continuity correction

data:  q
X-squared = 2.6165, df = 1, p-value = 0.1058
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
survey |> 
  filter(residue != "NA") |> 
  count (residue, inc_class) |> 
  ggplot(aes(residue, n, fill = inc_class))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#Dados de levantamento - variável categórica nominal
```
:::


## Cruzamento entre variáveis


::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_ee373e9bceb69b9640364c99a5e7cab4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
survey |> count (year)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
   year     n
  <dbl> <int>
1  2009   265
2  2010   216
3  2011   185
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#Frequência de ocorrência por ano

table (survey$year, survey$species)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
      
       Fgra Fspp
  2009  225   40
  2010  187   29
  2011  140   45
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_189a29dcde6e43252e1fc88fcf260268'}

```{.r .cell-code}
curve <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx","curve")

curve2 <- curve |> 
  group_by(Irrigation, day) |> 
  summarise(mean_severity = mean (severity),
            sd_severity = sd(severity))

curve2 |> ggplot(aes(day,mean_severity, color=Irrigation))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
curve2 |> ggplot(aes(day,mean_severity, color=Irrigation))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean_severity - sd_severity,
                    ymax = mean_severity + sd_severity),
                width = 0.1)+
  geom_line()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(epifitter)

curve3 <- curve |> 
  group_by(Irrigation, rep) |> 
  summarise(audpc = AUDPC(day, severity,
                          y_proportion = F)) |> 
  pivot_wider(1, names_from = Irrigation,
            values_from = audpc)

t.test(curve3$Drip, curve$Furrow)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

	One Sample t-test

data:  curve3$Drip
t = 51.206, df = 2, p-value = 0.0003812
alternative hypothesis: true mean is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 12.26473 14.51493
sample estimates:
mean of x 
 13.38983 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_c178281363644877d47309b5b81dc1cd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gsheet)

tw <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t5xftb0xSRPNFhM7h_MiPNtwt2UFUcm9/edit#gid=1594889893")
tw |> 
  group_by(cult,silicio,hai) |> 
  summarise (mean_lesion = mean (as.numeric(lesion_size)),
             sd_lesion = sd(lesion_size)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(hai,mean_lesion, color = silicio))+
  geom_line()+
  geom_point()+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean_lesion - sd_lesion,
                    ymax = mean_lesion + sd_lesion),
                width = 0.1)+
  facet_wrap(~cult)+
   labs (y = "Lesion size (mm)", x = "Hours after inoculation")+
  ggthemes::theme_few()+
  scale_color_grey()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(agricolae)

tw2 <- tw |>
  group_by(exp,cult,silicio,rep) |> 
  summarise(audpc=audpc(lesion_size, hai)) |> 
  filter (audpc > 0)

tw2 |> 
  ggplot(aes(cult,audpc, color = silicio))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  facet_wrap(~ exp)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Aula-15_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='Aula-15_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_84fafc76bf7d2e8f55cc857aec6137b5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov1 <- aov(sqrt(audpc) ~exp*cult*silicio, data = tw2)
summary(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                 Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value   Pr(>F)    
exp               1    0.1     0.1   0.033  0.85737    
cult              1  135.0   135.0  74.615 2.67e-10 ***
silicio           1  839.4   839.4 464.034  < 2e-16 ***
exp:cult          1    0.0     0.0   0.000  0.99843    
exp:silicio       1    0.0     0.0   0.002  0.96060    
cult:silicio      1   19.3    19.3  10.671  0.00239 ** 
exp:cult:silicio  1    0.0     0.0   0.015  0.90324    
Residuals        36   65.1     1.8                     
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(performance)
check_normality(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: residuals appear as normally distributed (p = 0.893).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
check_heteroscedasticity(aov1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
OK: Error variance appears to be homoscedastic (p = 0.316).
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(emmeans)
m1 <- emmeans (aov1, ~cult | silicio, type = "response")
```
:::
